column3: Term Dates for the 2021 year have been announced. Information Follows: "T1 - Starts Thursday 4th February for new students
column4: Friday 5th February for all returning students. Ends 9th April for all students."

column3: Athletics Day is on the horizon! This year we are holding it extra early to make the most of summer. Be sure to bring a water bottle, and sunscreen will be provided. The day we are holding it is the 26th of Februrary.
